targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*) AS total_transactions
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  (countIf(toBool(data.dropped)) * 100.0) / count(*) AS drop_rate
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  avg(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns)) / 1000000 AS avg_latency_ms
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.end_to_end_latency_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.tip_amount)) AS median_tip
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.tip_amount IS NOT NULL
  AND toUInt64(data.tip_amount) > 0
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns)) / 1000000 AS p50_latency_ms
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.end_to_end_latency_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  quantile(0.95)(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns)) / 1000000 AS p95_latency_ms
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.end_to_end_latency_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  quantile(0.99)(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns)) / 1000000 AS p99_latency_ms
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.end_to_end_latency_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  countIf(toBool(data.dropped)) AS total_dropped
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  countIf(NOT toBool(data.dropped)) AS total_landed
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  count(*) AS transaction_count
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  (countIf(toBool(data.dropped)) * 100.0) / count(*) AS drop_rate
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns) / 1000000) AS p50,
  quantile(0.95)(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns) / 1000000) AS p95,
  quantile(0.99)(toUInt64(data.end_to_end_latency_ns) / 1000000) AS p99
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.end_to_end_latency_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  toString(data.datacenter) AS datacenter,
  count(*) AS count
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.datacenter IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time, datacenter
ORDER BY time, count DESC

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  toString(data.txn_source) AS source,
  count(*) AS count
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.txn_source IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time, source
ORDER BY time, count DESC

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  toString(data.txn_strategy) AS strategy,
  count(*) AS count
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.txn_strategy IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time, strategy
ORDER BY time, count DESC

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  avg(toUInt64(data.tip_amount)) AS avg_tip
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.tip_amount IS NOT NULL
  AND toUInt64(data.tip_amount) > 0
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  (countIf(toBool(data.is_current_leader)) * 100.0) / count(*) AS leader_pct
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.is_current_leader IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  quantile(0.5)(toInt64(data.slot_delta)) AS p50,
  quantile(0.95)(toInt64(data.slot_delta)) AS p95,
  quantile(0.99)(toInt64(data.slot_delta)) AS p99
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.slot_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.open_uni_ns) / 1000) AS p50_open_uni_us,
  quantile(0.95)(toUInt64(data.open_uni_ns) / 1000) AS p95_open_uni_us,
  quantile(0.99)(toUInt64(data.open_uni_ns) / 1000) AS p99_open_uni_us
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.open_uni_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.write_all_ns) / 1000) AS p50_write_all_us,
  quantile(0.95)(toUInt64(data.write_all_ns) / 1000) AS p95_write_all_us,
  quantile(0.99)(toUInt64(data.write_all_ns) / 1000) AS p99_write_all_us
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.write_all_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  countIf(NOT toBool(data.dropped)) AS landed,
  countIf(toBool(data.dropped)) AS dropped
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.time_to_start_sending_ns) / 1000) AS p50_time_to_start_us,
  quantile(0.95)(toUInt64(data.time_to_start_sending_ns) / 1000) AS p95_time_to_start_us,
  quantile(0.99)(toUInt64(data.time_to_start_sending_ns) / 1000) AS p99_time_to_start_us
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.time_to_start_sending_ns IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Time to Start Sending Latency Percentiles

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toUInt64(data.slot) AS time,
  count(*) AS txns_sent
FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toBool(data.is_current_leader) = true
  AND data.slot IS NOT NULL
  AND match(toString(data.datacenter), '${datacenter:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.staked), '${staked:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.host), '${host:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.is_retry), '${is_retry:regex}')
  AND match(toString(data.dropped), '${dropped:regex}')

GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Txns Sent Per Slot (Current Leader Only)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.datacenter) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.datacenter IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.datacenter)
list.label: Datacenter
list.name: datacenter
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.datacenter) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.datacenter IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.datacenter)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.staked) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.staked IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.staked)
list.label: Staked
list.name: staked
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.staked) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.staked IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.staked)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.host) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.host IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.host)
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.host) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.host IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.host)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.is_retry) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.is_retry IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.is_retry)
list.label: Is Retry
list.name: is_retry
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.is_retry) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.is_retry IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.is_retry)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.dropped) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.dropped IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.dropped)
list.label: Dropped
list.name: dropped
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.dropped) FROM clickhouse_logs.txn_sender_logs WHERE data.dropped IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.dropped)
